Welcome to CrickBidders

Your ultimate platform for cricket auctions!

 Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, cardHoverStyle)} onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, cardStyle)} >

About Us

 CrickBidders is a premier platform dedicated to cricket enthusiasts and organizers who want to engage in online auctions for cricket tournaments. Our mission is to make cricket auctions accessible and enjoyable for teams, players, and fans alike. Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, cardHoverStyle)} onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, cardStyle)} >

How to Use CrickBidders
  • Register as a committee leader, team head, or player.
  • Set up an auction or join an existing team.
  • Bid on players, track points, and build your team!
